other_tests.findings: Severe metabolic acidosis with respiratory acidosis, hypoxemia, and hyperlactacidemia (pH 6.852, PaCO2 47.3 mmHg, PaO2 56.8 mmHg, SO2 74.8%, BE -25.3 mmol/L, lactic acid 11.3 mmol/L).
Enlarged kidneys (left kidney: 5.1 cm × 2.8 cm; right kidney: 3.5 cm × 1.5 cm), enhanced echogenicity, multiple cysts of various sizes. Bilateral ureters not dilated and bladder not filled.
Pulmonary hypertension, minor pulmonary valve regurgitation, patent ductus arteriosus, reduced left ventricular systolic function (LVEF: 43.5%, LVFS: 19%).
Bilateral pleural effusion (left 1.3 cm, right 0.3 cm).
Compound heterozygous pathogenic variant in the NPHP3 gene, nonsense mutation in exon 12 and a frameshift mutation in exon 1.
Confirmed that the nonsense mutation was derived from the father and the frameshift mutation from the mother.
